reviewText: I cannot say enough about David Phelp's voice!  One of the most outstanding tenors I have ever listened to! His vocal range is not to be believed.  I must say that this DVD brings all of his talent to bear. I have played it over and over and every time I hear something that I missed before.The DVD has so much more on it than the CD. The dialog between David and Bill before each piece is very interesting. The history of the theater,was great to hear.David's arrangement of 'The Angel Band' is the best I have ever heard. I loved it! His original music is not to be believed.  'The Dream' will keep you spellbound.I could go on and on, but, you need to listen to this for yourself and then you will see what I am speaking of.Blessings to David and his family and to the Gaithers for presenting him to us.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is a beautifully orchestrated DVD.  And David Phelps' selection of music is so powerful and moving.  He is funny, personable and, who in the world has a better voice than his?  You will enjoy not only his amazing musical talent, but also his creativity in production, such as the unusual presentation of "Angel Band."  In addition, you will meet his very talented children and his two sisters.  This is a long DVD - about 2 1/2 hours, but it flies by  because it touches your heart, your spirit and your emotions.  This is a great gift for yourself or for those who enjoy exquisite music.
summary: An absolute for every David Phelps Fan

reviewText: Wow!  This fellow can really sing and it was great to see the family sharing such music and love.  This is a very special DVD and CD that I would recommend to anyone.

reviewText: Best singer in the universe....Best performance possible...I listen to this DVD just about every  week....Love his performancewith his four talented children, and the commentary hosted by Bill Gaither...Excellent serious music...He composes, directs,  and each selection is made meaningful by his amazing vocal skills....

reviewText: I love it!So glad that David did this, and I really enjoy the conversations between Bill Gaither and David Phelps. / I have -in my library- "The Best of David Phelps," and even though I have the songs therein on other recordings I am so glad I bought it, and I am also delighted to have this outstanding DVD. It is very special.Even though I had seen the PBS show, this is even better. / So! If you like David Phelps, if you enjoy classical music, if you would like to see David's children and sisters sing, or if you just want something good, you're bound to like it.Others have already discussed the details, so I will say no more, except that it is a lot of good music for the price. What a deal!So, make some popcorn. :)PMT

reviewText: The best tenor ever can be found on this DVD.  It provides inspiration at the greatest level.  I hope more of his work is on the way.

reviewText: I ordered one for my sister as soon as I heard it.I could not imagine his voice could improve - but this is even better than the other two.The duet with his daughter and his obvious love and respect for her is a good parenting lesson.This music touched me to the core.
summary: the best of the best - so far!

reviewText: What a career this young man has in front of him. The ability to sing the classics and put a modern take on them is nothing short of brilliant. I have watched this many times since purchasing it and shared it with friends and family. I've created a number of David Phelps fans.Wendell Nelson
